name: The Honorable Deborah L. Canty
assigned: PA - Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas
bio:
The Hon. Deborah L. Canty is a judge for the Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas in Pennsylvania. She was elected to the bench on November 7, 2017.

Prior to her election, Canty worked as an attorney at Montgomery McCracken as well as the Philadelphia Office of the City Solicitor. She has also served as the Director of Quality Assurance and Corporate Compliance at ChildFirst Services.

Canty earned a bachelorâ€™s degree from Messiah College. She then completed an M.S.W. from the University of Pennsylvania (1996) and a J.D. from Temple University James E. Beasley School of Law (2000).

She is registered as a Democrat.
